subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Football
lead_paragraph: The former Minnesota Vikings great Carl Eller refused to cooperate with Minneapolis police officers during a run-in last April because he knew he was drunk and he wanted to delay or prevent an alcohol test, a judge said.
snippet: The former Minnesota Vikings great Carl Eller refused to cooperate with Minneapolis police officers during a run-in last April because he knew he was drunk and he wanted to delay or prevent an alcohol test, a judge said.
